Marc dan Alex Marquez, Kakak-Adik Tersukses di MotoGP
05 Nov 2019, 14:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sirkuit Sepang, Malaysia, menjadi saksi tergoresnya sejarah baru Grand Prix motor dunia pada Minggu (3/11/2019). Untuk kedua kali, Marc Marquez dan Alex Marquez, meraih gelar dunia pada tahun yang sama. Alex akhirnya menjuarai Moto2, menyusul sang kakak yang telah mengunci gelar MotoGP di Buriram, Thailand.
Sebelumnya, Marc dan Alex juga pernah kompak merebut gelar dunia pada tahun yang sama, yakni pada 2014. Kala itu, Marc meraih gelar dunia di MotoGP, sementara sang adik di kelas Moto3, usai mengalahkan Jack Miller hanya dengan keunggulan dua poin.
Jika dirunut, sejatinya banyak kakak-adik yang turun di ajang Grand Prix, namun hanya segelintir yang mampu kompak meraih sukses. Di antara mereka, enam kakak-adik yang prestasinya kompak mencolok, namun menurut statistik, Marquez Bersaudara lah yang paling berhasil karena mereka memiliki 10 gelar dunia.

Marc and Alex Marquez, The Most Successful Brother in MotoGP
05 Nov 2019, 14:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sepang Circuit, Malaysia, witnesses the etching of the new history of the world motorcycle Grand Prix on Sunday (3/11/2019). For the second time, Marc Marquez and Alex Marquez, won world titles in the same year. Alex finally won Moto2, following his brother who has locked the MotoGP title in Buriram, Thailand.
Previously, Marc and Alex had also won a world title in the same year, namely in 2014. At that time, Marc won a world title in MotoGP, while his younger brother in the Moto3 class, after defeating Jack Miller only with a two-point advantage.
If traced, in fact many brothers and sisters who fell at the Grand Prix, but only a handful were able to compact success. Among them, six brothers and sisters whose achievements are strikingly compact, but according to statistics, the Marquez Brothers are the most successful because they have 10 world titles.
